segments.text: Hello , I am Mr . Johnson at room 309 . I would like to have a safe box . Do I need to pay for a safe box ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you don't . Just fill out this card and sign your name and room number on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Can I have a larger envelope to put my valuable things in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute . This is your safe box key , don't lose it . You'll have to pay two thousand yuan if you lose the key .
segments.speaker: S2
